name: Agent Maya Reyes
role: Temporal Anomalies Division - Intelligence operative hunting Elliot
core_wound: Lost her partner during quantum computing experiment that revealed temporal mechanics - he was erased from timeline, only she remembers him. Government told her it was psychotic break. Knows they lied.
wants: To secure temporal technology before it destroys causality itself
needs: To trust that some things should remain unknown - that not all knowledge should be weaponized
voice_markers: Interrogation technique speech - questions designed to extract info
Refers to temporal anomalies in military threat terminology
Dry, dark humor ('Time travel. Of course. Easier than my Tuesday.')
Protective of subordinates but cold to targets
Occasionally references her erased partner - catches herself, covers
contradiction: Works for government to control temporal tech while knowing government caused her trauma. Hunts Elliot to prevent timeline damage while suspecting he might be trying to prevent greater damage.
physical_description: Compact and athletic, observant eyes that miss nothing. Professional suit concealing weapons. Keeps hair short for practicality. Scar on left hand from 'incident that didn't happen.' Always has exit strategy.

relationships.Elliot Cross: Target, then reluctant ally when she realizes government wants to weaponize loop
relationships.Dr. Soren: Considers dangerous fanatic - tracking Recursionists for years
relationships.Elliot Omega: Encounters in Ch40 - he remembers timelines where she killed younger Elliot
relationships.Cassandra Wright: Uses her to track Elliot, develops respect
